text: Jean-Pierre Roy (June 26, 1920 – November 1, 2014) was a Canadian baseball player in Major League Baseball. He pitched in three games during the 1946 season for the Brooklyn Dodgers. He was born in Montreal, Quebec. Roy died on November 1, 2014 at his home in Tampa, Florida, United States. He was 94.Jean- Pierre Roy s'éteint à 94 ans ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Brooklyn Dodgers players Category:Sportspeople from Montreal
title: Jean-Pierre Roy
